amendment.description: An amendment to insert provisions prohibiting use of funds for enforcement of EPA's Toxics Release Inventory Burden Reduction Proposed Rule published in the Federal Register, or to follow the Toxics Release Inventory 2006 Burden Reduction Proposed Rule also published in the Federal Register.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pallone amendment (A011) Agreed to by recorded vote: 231 - 187 (Roll no. 165).
